story.kicker_image_caption: All India Entrance Test 2016: Exam on June 26
story.storykicker: The exam is scheduled to be held on June 26.
story.storybody:
The All India Entrance Test (AIET) exam date has been released on its official website. The exam is scheduled to be held on June 26.

Educational qualification:
The candidates should have acquired a Bachelor's degree in any discipline from a recognised university or institute.

How to apply:
The eligible candidates can get an application form from the Vidyapeeth office.

Application fee:
An application fee of Rs 500 needs to be paid by the candidates for the registration procedure. The candidates can make the payment through demand draft, drawn in favour of "Registrar, Dr. D. Y. Patil Vidyapeeth", payable at Pune.
The exam will consist of multiple choice questions based on business judgement, general awareness, English language, numerical ability and test of reasoning. The exam will be held for a duration of two hours and thirty minutes.

Important dates:

  • Last date of the submission of an application form:

Without late fee: June 15
With late fee: June 22

  • Date of AIET: June 26
  • Declaration of results: July 5

About the exam:
The exam is conducted for taking admission to Master of Business Administration (MBA) program offered in Human Resource Management, Finance Management, Marketing Management, International Business Management, Hospital & Health Care Management, Pharmaceutical Management, Biotechnology & Bioinformatics Management and IT & Systems Management.

Get latest updates on exam notifications and scholarships across India and abroad here.
